text: Chesty XIII pictured in 2012 Chesty XIII (born about 2007) was the mascot of the United States Marine Corps from 2008 to 2013. A male English Bulldog, he was named after Chesty Puller. James N. Mattis once described Chesty XIII as "a kindred soul", however, the dog was also disruptive on at least one occasion when he snarled and barked at Bravo, United States Secretary of Defense Leon Panetta's Golden Retriever. ==See also== * Jiggs II ==References== |- |- Category:United States Marine Corps lore and symbols Category:Military animals Category:Individual dogs Category:American mascots
title: Chesty XIII
